<title level="1" right="Rules">[Stealth or Stealth DC](/Rules.aspx?ID=2861)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 100 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Complex hazards list their Stealth modifier, which they use for initiative, instead of their Stealth DC. If you need the DC, it’s equal to this modifier + 10.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
